analysis.description:
Reentrancy in InsightsNetwork3.importBalance (/unique_chucks/7/0x2371c3764abf450c60a9985a74f8ce08a8fc7449.sol#827-865):
	External calls:
	- amount = source.balanceOf(account) (/unique_chucks/7/0x2371c3764abf450c60a9985a74f8ce08a8fc7449.sol#835)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- imported (/unique_chucks/7/0x2371c3764abf450c60a9985a74f8ce08a8fc7449.sol#836)

Reentrancy in InsightsNetwork3.importBalance (/unique_chucks/7/0x2371c3764abf450c60a9985a74f8ce08a8fc7449.sol#827-865):
	External calls:
	- amount = source.balanceOf(account) (/unique_chucks/7/0x2371c3764abf450c60a9985a74f8ce08a8fc7449.sol#835)
	- mintAmount = amount - source.lockedBalanceOf(account) (/unique_chucks/7/0x2371c3764abf450c60a9985a74f8ce08a8fc7449.sol#836)
	- unlockTime = source.unlockTimes(account,index) (/unique_chucks/7/0x2371c3764abf450c60a9985a74f8ce08a8fc7449.sol#852-853)
	- mintAmount = source.lockedBalances(account,index) (/unique_chucks/7/0x2371c3764abf450c60a9985a74f8ce08a8fc7449.sol#855-857)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- balances (/unique_chucks/7/0x2371c3764abf450c60a9985a74f8ce08a8fc7449.sol#860-861)
	- totalSupply_ (/unique_chucks/7/0x2371c3764abf450c60a9985a74f8ce08a8fc7449.sol#860-861)
amount in InsightsNetwork2Base.lockedBalanceOf (/unique_chucks/7/0x2371c3764abf450c60a9985a74f8ce08a8fc7449.sol#751) is a local variable never initialiazed

InsightsNetwork3.importBalance has external calls inside a loop:

InsightsNetwork3.importBalance has external calls inside a loop:

InsightsNetwork1.register (/unique_chucks/7/0x2371c3764abf450c60a9985a74f8ce08a8fc7449.sol#643-667) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- assert(bool)(unlockTime > currentTime) (/unique_chucks/7/0x2371c3764abf450c60a9985a74f8ce08a8fc7449.sol#665)

InsightsNetworkMigrationToEOS.reject (/unique_chucks/7/0x2371c3764abf450c60a9985a74f8ce08a8fc7449.sol) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool)((changeTime[msg.sender] + gracePeriod) > block.timestamp) (/unique_chucks/7/0x2371c3764abf450c60a9985a74f8ce08a8fc7449.sol)
